cards.title: Thri
powers: {Thri} deals 1 target 2 projectile damage. If this is the third power used this turn, increase that damage by 3.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

cards.title: Rule of Three
body: If you use the third power on any turn, increase damage dealt by that power by 2.
You may use 1 additional power during your power phase.

cards.title: Find the Shot
powers: Draw 1 card. Discard 1 card. You may use 1 power now.

cards.title: Call the Shot
body: At the end of each Hero turn, you may destroy this card.
When this card is destroyed, you may use 1 power.
Each Hero gains the following power:
[b]Power:[/b] This hero deals 1 target{BR}       2 projectile damage.

cards.title: Loadout: Anchor
powers: {Thri} deals 1 target 1 projectile damage and 1 toxic damage. If this is the third power used this turn, {Thri} deals that target 1 radiant damage and you may destroy an ongoing or environment card.

cards.title: Loadout: Slick
powers: {Thri} deals 1 target 3 radiant damage. If this is the third power used this turn, {Thri} deals up to 2 other targets 3 radiant damage each.

cards.title: Loadout: Whisper
powers: {Thri} deals up to 3 targets 1 projectile damage each. If this is the third power used this turn, draw 3 cards.

cards.title: Tools of the Trade
body: Search your deck for 1 equipment card and play it. Shuffle your deck.
You may use 1 power now.

cards.title: Geared Up
body: Each player may draw 1 card or play 1 equipment card.
{Thri} deals up to 6 targets 1 projectile damage each.

cards.title: From the Hip
body: You may use 1 power now.
You may draw 1 card.
You may play 1 card.

cards.title: Synchronize Strike
body: Up to 2 players, other than you, use 1 power now.

cards.title: Third Time's the Charm'
body: Draw 3 cards.
Use the power printed on {Thri} thrice.
{Thri} deals themselves 3 psychic damage.

cards.title: Covering Fire
body: When {Thri} would deal a Hero projectile damage, prevent it and put the bottom card of that Hero's deck under this card.
When a Hero would be dealt damage by a non-Hero target damage, destroy all of that Hero's cards under this card and reduce that damage by 2 for each card destroyed this way.
powers: Thri deals up to 2 targets 1 projectile damage.

cards.title: Lead the Target
body: When {Thri} uses a power, you may put the bottom card of another Hero's deck under this card.
When another Hero would deal a non-Hero target damage, destroy all of that Hero's cards under this card and increase that damage by 1 for each card destroyed this way.

promoCards.title: Thri - Gun Club
powers: Play a card or use a power now.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.
